test-case.name: fn-hours-from-dateTime1args-1
test-case.description: Evaluates The "hours-from-dateTime" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg = xs:dateTime(lower bound)

test-case.name: fn-hours-from-dateTime1args-2
test-case.description: Evaluates The "hours-from-dateTime" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg = xs:dateTime(mid range)

test-case.name: fn-hours-from-dateTime1args-3
test-case.description: Evaluates The "hours-from-dateTime" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg = xs:dateTime(upper bound)

test-case.name: K-HoursFromDateTimeFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `hours-from-dateTime()`.

test-case.name: K-HoursFromDateTimeFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `hours-from-dateTime((), "Wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-HoursFromDateTimeFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(hours-from-dateTime(()))`.

test-case.name: K-HoursFromDateTimeFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `hours-from-dateTime(()) instance of xs:integer?`.

test-case.name: K-HoursFromDateTimeFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `hours-from-dateTime(xs:dateTime("2001-02-03T08:23:12.43")) eq 8`.
